title: Medallion, "Rabbit in the Moon", 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal threads
Technique: embroidered in pattern darning, satin and couching stitches on gauze-weave foundation
description: Circular medallion with a frame and a pictorial center. The frame contains a landscape with cloud motifs embroidered in polychrome silks on a green ground. In the center, a white rabbit is standing in front of small building with trees, stirring a blue vessel with a long spoon. The rabbit beating the elixir of life is often shown on the robe of a T'aoist priest.

tombstone.epitaph:
Medallion, "Rabbit in the Moon", 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk, metal threads
Technique: embroidered in pattern darning, satin and couching stitches on gauze-weave foundation. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-149.
